  • yawning_titan.networks.network_creator.load_network

yawning_titan.networks.network_creator.load_network

yawning_titan.networks.network_creator.load_network(network_name: str) → Tuple[array, dict][source]

Load a saved network so that it can be used by the generic network environment.

Parameters

network_name – The name of the network.

Returns

The adjacency matrix. A position dictionary for all the nodes.

Warning

Deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
